summary: This document is an Amended and Restated Credit Agreement dated November 14, 2025, involving Empire State Realty OP, L.P. as the Borrower, Empire State Realty Trust, Inc. as the Parent, Wells Fargo Bank as the Administrative Agent, and various lenders. It replaces the prior credit agreement dated March 19, 2020, and outlines the terms for a term loan facility, including borrowing, repayment, interest, fees, and various covenants and conditions.
